Posts.Content: Oct 17, 2011 08:57PM jkelso54 wrote: I had 1 cm cancer to the right of my right breast, 14 of 27 lymph nodes positive.  Diagnosed as ILC.  I will see Oncologist Oct 31.  ILC didn't show up in MRI or CT but they said ILC does that.  It hides and they were sure they would find masses in my breast after double MX but there were none in my breasts.  I don't have any idea what to expect for treatment except that surgeon said I would have to have chemo and rads.  From what I read, I am Stage IIA.  Glad I found this thread.
Posts.Title: Stage II w/Lymph Node Involvement Warrior517 Moderators
